mainText:
Though I'd expected it to happen "some day" Steve Jobs' death still shocks
and saddens me.  Since I got my first Apple computer back in 1977, Steve and
Apple have been a major part of my life.  For the decade of the 80's I wrote
some of the earliest computer games on Apple II computers, and 30 years
later am deploying Apple computers for schools and community centers.  The
world will be a lesser place without Steve Jobs.
header: Steve Jobs' and Apple's pivotal role in the last 30 years of my life
author: Greg
